item.title: A git workflow for ecologists
item.description: Git Target audience for this workflow Basic workflow Use case Principle Branching workflow with pull requests Use case Principle Branch Pull request Conflicts Flowcharts Rules for collaboration Exceptions Git For those how donâ€™t know git, it is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency. I use git daily, including for this blog.
